item.title: VS code 快捷键大全
item.description: VS code 快捷键大全 General Ctrl+Shift+P, F1 Show Command Palette Ctrl+P Quick Open, Go to File… Ctrl+Shift+N New window/instance Ctrl+Shift+W Close window/instance Ctrl+, User Settings Ctrl+K Ctrl+S Keyboard Shortcuts Basic editing Ctrl+X Cut line (empty selection) Ctrl+C Copy line (empty selection) Alt+ ↑ / ↓ Move line up/down Shift+Alt + ↓ / ↑ Copy line up/down Ctrl+Shift+K Delete line Ctrl+Enter Insert line below Ctrl+Shift+Enter Insert line above Ctrl+Shift+\ Jump to matching bracket
